n = int(input())
skill = [int(input()) for _ in range(n)]

print(sum(max(0, max(skill) - x) for x in skill))

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int,input().split()))

a.sort()

count = 0
i = 0
while i < n:
    if a[i] == a[i+1]:
        i += 2
        continue
    else:
        count += 1
        a[i] += 1

print(count)

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

min_problems = 0
for i in range(n):
    min_problems += max(a[i], 100 - a[i])

print(min_problems)

n = int(input())
skills = list(map(int, input().split()))

s = sum(skills)
m = min(skills)

print(s - m*n)
